class GrTextureStage

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef unsigned int GrTextureStage::GenTextureFlag

gen-texture flags. These are bit flags so that the renderer can quickly check for procedurally generated textures.

Definition at line 29 of file GrTextureStage.h.

void GrTextureStage::BindTexture ( unsigned int  glTextureUnit  )  const

binds the stage's texture to the sampler specified.

no texture? Then there is nothing to do.

get the texturing quality.

grab the filter modes.

get the mip bias (if any).

bind the texture.
